descriptionHtml:
_____________________________________________________________________________


A reskinned underwear mod for females in different colors!
Look at all these colors! You want them all? Than just download my [b]Sexy Undies Pack[/b]!
Wilderness proof!
Mountain proof!!
Dragon proof!!!


_____________________________________________________________________________


How to:

1. Copy the content of the "mesh" folder (Data) into the root folder
of Skyrim. (C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrim)
2. Go into the "textures" folder and choose a color. Copy the content
of the folder from your chosen color (Data again) into the root
folder of Skyrim.
3. Have Fun!


_____________________________________________________________________________


So geht's:

1. Kopiere den Inhalt des Ordners "mesh" (Data) in den root Ordner
von Skyrim. (C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrim)
2. Im "textures" Ordner wählst du dir eine Farbe aus. Der Ordner der
gewünschten Farbe enthält einen weiteren Data Ordner den du in das
Rootverzeichnis von Skyrim kopierst.
3. Viel Spaß!


_____________________________________________________________________________



More nudemods on [url=http://lustful-illumination.blogspot.com]Lustful Illumination[/url]
author: Vergil
